messages.camera.delete-connection-prompt: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
messages.camera.name: Camera name
messages.camera.restart-connections-prompt: Are you sure you want to restart all connections?
messages.camera.validating-message: This may take a moment. Please do not leave this page while the connection validates.
messages.common.unsaved-changes-will-be-lost-navi: You have unsaved changes that will be lost if you decide to leave this page.
messages.configuration.api-key.label: API Key
messages.configuration.api-key.tooltip: API Key for authenticating your client application with Intenseye Backend API
messages.configuration.mqtt-host.label: MQTT Host Address
messages.configuration.mqtt-host.tooltip: The address for smart devices to reach Intenseye Client embedded MQTT server, typically the internal network IP address of the server that runs Intenseye Client
messages.configuration.mqtt-password.label: MQTT Password (Optional)
messages.configuration.mqtt-password.tooltip: The password of embedded MQTT server credentials with which smart devices can connect, if authentication is required within a facility.
messages.configuration.mqtt-port.label: MQTT Port
messages.configuration.mqtt-port.tooltip: The port for smart devices to reach Intenseye Client embedded MQTT server, typically '1883'
messages.configuration.mqtt-username.label: MQTT Username (Optional)
messages.configuration.mqtt-username.tooltip: The username of embedded MQTT server credentials with which smart devices can connect, if authentication is required within a facility.
messages.configuration.port.label: Port
messages.configuration.port.tooltip: The port to reach Intenseye Client application over, typically '6777'
messages.configuration.scheme.label: Protocol
messages.configuration.scheme.tooltip: Protocol to access Intenseye Client, typically 'http'
messages.configuration.smart-devices.title: Intenseye Client - Smart Devices Configuration
messages.configuration.title: Intenseye Client - Configuration
messages.facility.name: Facility name
